name: interlude
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short period when a situation or activity is different from what comes before and after it: After a brief interlude working as an architect, he went travelling. The musical interludes don't really fit in with the rest of the play.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a period or event that comes between two others and is different from them: The ferry trip was a relaxing interlude during the drive.
